id.comment: Check if a procedures calls another procedure

query.querystr: procedure p, q; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls (p, _)

id.comment: Check if a procedures calls another procedure

query.querystr: procedure p, q; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls (p, q)

id.comment: Check if a procedure directly calls procedure

query.querystr: procedure p, q; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls (p, q) with q.procName = "Third" such that Modifies (p, "i")

id.comment: Check if a procedure directly calls procedure

query.querystr: procedure p; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls (p, "Third") and Modifies (p, "i")

id.comment: Check if a procedure calls procedure

query.querystr: procedure p; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls* (p, "Third")

id.comment: Check if a procedure is called from

query.querystr: procedure p; call c; while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls ("Second", p) and Parent (w, c) with c.procName = p.procName

id.comment: Check if Line 1 modifies variable y

query.querystr: procedure p; call c; while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(1, "y")

id.comment: Check if Line 3 uses variable v

query.querystr: procedure p; call c; while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Uses(3, "v")

id.comment: Check if procedure First modifies variable y

query.querystr: procedure p; call c; while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies("First", "y")

id.comment: Check if procedure Third modifies variable y

query.querystr: procedure p; call c; while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies("Third", "y")

id.comment: Check if there are call statements that uses variable

query.querystr: procedure p; call c; while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Uses(c, _)
